title: Jamaican jerked chicken salad
ingredients: ['4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 tsp dried thyme', '1 tsp freshly ground black pepper', '3/4 tsp ground allspice', '3/4 tsp salt', '4 tbsp red wine vinegar', '2 tbsp Dijon mustard', '2 tsp dark muscovado sugar', '4 chicken breast fillets, about 150g each', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', '220g can pineapple chunks in juice, drained', '4 kiwi fruit, peeled and cut into wedges', '1 large red pepper, seeded and cut into thin strips', '250g mooli radish, peeled and sliced (optional)']
